parameters.definition: Total capacity of a floppy disk

description: Before going on vacation you want to make floppy disk backups of important files, sizes of which you are given. You have at your disposal several blank floppy disks of varying capacities. Assuming that you do not have any programs to compress the data and that you have enough floppy disks available for back up everything, how do you distribute these files on the floppy disks in order to minimize the number of floppy disks used.
